verses.roman:
āira caraṇa yāi' karilā vandana
jagannāthera vastra-prasāda kailā nivedana

synonyms: āira—of Śacīmātā; caraṇa—to the lotus feet; yāi'-going; karilā vandana—offered prayers; jagannāthera—of Lord Jagannātha; vastra-prasāda—cloth and prasāda; kailā nivedana—offered.
translation: When he arrived, he offered prayers at her lotus feet and then offered her the cloth and prasāda of Lord Jagannātha.
